title: Rotor debuts Universal Tooth Design chainrings for SRAM, Shimano 11 & 12 speed MTB
content:
While the drivetrain brands prefer you run their complete setup, and indeed have put a lot of time and effort into optimizing their systems to be run “on brand” from tip to tail, sometimes we just like to have options. And Rotor’s carbon and alloy cranks are some very nice options. Now, they’re offering new

The post Rotor debuts Universal Tooth Design chainrings for SRAM, Shimano 11 & 12 speed MTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
